title: Raytracing Engine
description: A Vulkan-based raytracing engine supporting emissive materials and a denoiser. This project serves a research and for further integration with my game engine. Will still implement meshes calculations and importance sampling.

title: Majin - Game Engine
description: Modern 3D game engine built in C++23 with Vulkan, designed for high-performance rendering and indie game development.

title: Turbo Soccer
description: A local-multiplayer car-soccer game built in Unity, where players score goals in a FEUP-themed arena by navigating obstacles and collecting power-ups.

title: DeepMine - A Strategic Mining Game
description: A strategic 2D mining game where unstable terrain and chain-reaction collapses make every dig decision critical. Built in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 57 using Unity, featuring grid-based systems, physics-driven gameplay, and a risk-reward ore economy.

title: Egg Retrieval Game
description: WebGL bird game where the player retrieves eggs and returns them to the nest, featuring custom terrain, trees, textures, and interactive gameplay.

title: TurboThree Racing Game
description: 3D graphics and game development projects with Three.js, featuring object modeling, procedural generation, particle systems, and interactive UIs

title: Graphics Engine
description: Implemented using Three.js, this engine features bump map textures and video textures. It supports wireframe view, buffer geometry with color gradients, and custom cameras in a shooting range scene.

title: Cannon Clash
description: A Unity-built Local-Coop game made for a GameJam over a weekend. Cannon islands fight to the death!

title: FEP Chatbot
description: A scalable AI-powered chatbot for a Portuguese university, built with TypeScript and Python. Leveraged Azure OpenAI to provide the LLM capacity for the chatbot. The chatbot was deployed on premises with a custom made deployment pipeline.
